title: Website Designer
description:
Develop and maintain WordPress-based websites for clients across various industries.
 Customize themes and plugins to meet clients' specific requirements and design preferences.

title: WordPress Development Intern
description:
Sevens J's Digital is seeking a talented and dedicated WordPress Intern. 
 This internship offers flexible working hours, allowing you to balance your studies

title: Backend Developer
description:
Develop server-side logic and APIs to support front-end functionalities. 
 Work with databases (SQL or NoSQL) to store and retrieve data efficiently.
